content: भ्रांत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [भ्रम्-क्त] {@--1@} Wandered or roamed about. {@--2@} Turned round, whirled, revolved. {@--3@} Erred, mistaken, gone astray. {@--4@} Perplexed, confused. {@--5@} Moving about, moving to and fro, wheeling. {@--6@} Whirling or turning round, roaming or wandering about. --तः {@--1@} An elephant in rut. {@--2@} A kind of thorn-apple. --तं {@--1@} Roaming, moving about; वरं पर्वतदुर्गेषु भ्रांतं वनचरैः सह <ls>Bh. 2. 14.</ls> {@--2@} A mistake, an error.
